headline: How The Evolving AI Storage Story Is Reshaping Seagate Technology Holdings Valuation
summary: Seagate Technology Holdings has seen its fair value estimate tick up to about $297 per share from roughly $289, as analysts factor in modestly stronger long term growth powered by AI driven data center demand and disciplined industry capacity. While the discount rate has nudged only slightly higher to around 7.97%, a wave of recent Street target hikes underscores a growing conviction that AI infrastructure buildouts and tighter HDD supply can support a more optimistic long run revenue...
